segments.text: I can't believe my eyes—the sink is completely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water just cascades over the edge like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, drying dishes, totally unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's in the puddle, yet she doesn't react at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And look, kids on the side raiding the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balanced precariously on that tilting stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand in the jar, the other holding a plate—ingenious or crazy?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, expecting her cookie handout.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a serene garden, totally opposite to this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked neatly, but chaos brews nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who left the faucet on like that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This setup is full of unexpected twists.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I never saw the stool looking so unstable before.
segments.speaker: PAR
